 Hi,
    We are developing a J2EE application.How do I
 justify use of JUnit in my application.In other
 words how does use of JUnit benefit developers.I am
really new to JUnit.What are the advantages of using
JUnit in terms of productivity and time of development
point of view.
   It will be really my pleasure to see your reply.
   
 
 thanks and regards,
 jalam
